DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence incidence diabetes report vary among populations.Immigrants group undergone significant life-style change tend develop diabetes within short time . The aim study assess prevalence diabetes mellitus Ethiopian population ,15-20 year immigration Israel .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Ethiopian Community Israel : Update
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct three primary care clinic Jezreel Valley ( Omer , Givat Hamore Afula Illit ) . The computerized medical chart 500 Ethiopian adult review . The following information obtain : age , date arrival Israel , know history diabetes , hyperlipidemia , hypertension disease , drug therapy , body weight , blood pressure . Following laboratory data retrieve : blood glucose , HbA1c , lipid level , creatinine uric acid . The criterion use definition diabetes base criterion propose American Diabetes Association .
DOC.criteria: Male female Ethiopians Jews immigrate Israel 1991 18 year old immigration . Type 1 diabetes Mellitus
DOC.keyword: Diabetes Mellitus , prevalence , Ethiopians Jews , Israel
